name: Introduction to Economics
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of economics, including supply and demand, market structures, economic decision making, and economic concepts.

name: Intermediate Microeconomics
description: This course introduces students to the microeconomic foundations of industrial organization, including game theory, market power, and pricing strategies.

name: Industrial Organization
description: This course introduces students to the theories and empirics of industrial organization, including markets with imperfect competition, antitrust, and government regulation.
